member.name: ID3D12DebugDevice.GetFeatureMask
member.summary: Gets a bit field of flags that indicates which debug features are on or off.
member.returns: Mask of feature-mask flags, as a bitwise OR'ed combination of enumeration constants. If a flag is present, then that feature will be set to on, otherwise the feature will be set to off.

member.name: ID3D12DebugDevice.ReportLiveDeviceObjects
member.summary: Reports information about a device object's lifetime.
member.param: A value from the enumeration. This method uses the value in Flags to determine the amount of information to report about a device object's lifetime.
member.returns: This method returns one of the Direct3D 12 Return Codes.HRESULT

member.name: ID3D12DebugDevice.SetFeatureMask
member.summary: Set a bit field of flags that will turn debug features on and off.
member.param: Feature-mask flags, as a bitwise-OR'd combination of enumeration constants. If a flag is present, that feature will be set to on; otherwise, the feature will be set to off.
member.returns: This method returns one of the Direct3D 12 Return Codes.HRESULT

member.name: ID3D12DebugDevice
member.summary: This interface represents a graphics device for debugging.
